entry.content:

entry.title: [Global][HostedPrivateCloud] - Vmotion
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 8, 06:00 UTC  -  Jul 12, 16:00 UTC

Jun 19, 22:40 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

Start time : 08/07/2024 06:00 UTC
End time : 12/07/2024 16:00 UTC
Service impact : Management unavailable for 1h and all hosts will be put in maintenance (Vmotion).
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for hosts and vCenter Server services . An individual communication will be sent before the upgrade begins.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [RBX8][Vmware] - R821L18 / R821L16 / R821L17
entry.content:
Jul 4, 21:09 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 04/07/2024 18:54 UTC
End Time : 04/07/2024 21:07 UTC
Root cause : Electrical disjunction
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jul 4, 19:35 UTC
Investigating - Start time: 04/07/2024 18:54 UTC
User impact :Some users are unable to reach their storage units and hosts are disconnected.
Ongoing Actions: Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [BHS1A][Vmware] - Cluster147
entry.content:
Jul 3, 22:06 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 03/07/2024 17:58 UTC
End Time : 03/07/2024 21:45 UTC
Root cause : Hardware malfunction
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jul 3, 19:36 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Jul 3, 19:35 UTC
Investigating - Start time: 03/07/2024 17:58 UTC
User impact : Some customers are not able to access their servers.
Technical impact : BHS1A
Ongoing Actions: Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.
